text: Thomas Andrew "Tom" Felton (born 22 September 1987) is an English actor and singer. Felton was born in Epsom, Surrey. He is best known for portraying the character Draco Malfoy in the Harry Potter movies. Felton has also won a MTV Movie Award for Best Villain in the film version of Harry Potter and the Half- Blood Prince in 2010. ==Movies == Film Year Title Role Notes 1997 The Borrowers Peagreen Clock 1999 Anna and the King Louis Leonowens 2001 Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone Draco Malfoy 2002 Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets Draco Malfoy 2004 Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban Draco Malfoy 2005 Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire Draco Malfoy 2007 Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix Draco Malfoy 2009 The Disappeared Simon 2009 Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince Draco Malfoy 2010 Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, Part 1 Draco Malfoy 2010 Get Him to the Greek Himself Cameo appearance 2010 13 Hours Gary 2011 Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, Part II Draco Malfoy 2011 The Apparition Patrick 2011 Rise of the Planet of the Apes Dodge ==Websites== * Tom Felton's official website * Tom Felton's Secondary official website Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Surrey Category:British child actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors
